headline: LAKESHORE AUTOTUNING TEMPERATURE MONITOR
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Lake Shore Cryo
Model 218
Description Temperature Monitor
Other Information
  • Eight sensors read twice each second
  • Supports platinum RTDs, diodes and NTC resistors
  • Cryogenic and high temperature applications
  • High accuracy, high resolution
  • Eight readings displayed in K, °C, V or W
  • Flexible interface options
Extended Description Details at Lakeshore 218_temp monitor.pdf
Power Requirements 120/240 V 0.3 A 0.2 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.500 in (21.6 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 7 lb (3 kg)
